header.title: UNcedo lweKhuseleko
header.tagline: UKhuseleko Olwenziwe Ngeso Sakho, UKuthotyelwa Okwenziwe Lula‚ÄîNgaso Nasiphi Isihlandlo, Naphi Na

step_0.title: üìú Wamkelekile kwiNcedo lweKhuseleko
step_0.description: Phonononga izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezixhobo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini kwindawo yakho yokusebenza.
step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Ngaba uyazi ukuba ukusebenzisa abanikezeli abanokuziphatha okuhle kunokunciphisa iingozi emsebenzini ngokuqinisekisa ukuba umsebenzi wenziwa ngexesha kwaye ngokomgangatho ophezulu wokhuseleko?

intro.title: Wamkelekile kwiNcedo lweKhuseleko
intro.description: Phonononga izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezixhobo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini kwindawo yakho yokusebenza.

welcome.title: Wamkelekile kwiNcedo lweKhuseleko
welcome.description: Iqonga lakho elithembekileyo lokhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini (OHS) eMzantsi Afrika. Sinikezela ngezixhobo ezizenzekelayo, eziphuculwe yi-AI ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko kunye nokuthotyelwa kweendawo zokusebenza, izikolo, iicawe, kunye namacandelo angacwangciswanga. Joyina uluntu lwethu ukufikelela kwizixhobo, iinkonzo, kunye nenkxaso eyenzelwe iimfuno zakho.

why_choose.title: Kutheni uKhetha iNcedo lweKhuseleko loKuthotyelwa kwe-OHS?
why_choose.content: INcedo lweKhuseleko ngumlingani wakho othembekileyo wokuthotyelwa kokhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini eMzantsi Afrika. Iqonga lethu linikezela ngezixhobo ezibanzi ezilungiselelwe ukuhlangabezana neemfuno ezizodwa zamashishini afana nokwakha, ukumbiwa kwezinto phantsi komhlaba, kunye nemveliso. Ukusuka ekwenzeni iirejista zomthetho ukuya ekuqhubeni uvavanyo lwengozi, iNcedo lweKhuseleko yenza lula iimfuno ze-OHS ezintsonkothileyo ngeewizadi ezilula ukuzisebenzisa kunye nenkxaso yexesha langempela nge-chatbot yethu ephefumlelwe yi-AI. Ixhaswa yimimiselo yaseMzantsi Afrika kunye neendlela ezingcono, sinika amashishini amandla okudala iindawo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo ngelixa siqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa kwe-OHSA ne-COIDA. Joyina amawaka abasebenzi abaxhomekeke kwiNcedo lweKhuseleko ukukhusela amaqela abo kunye nokwenza lula iinkqubo zokhuseleko.

client.title: Izibophelelo zoMthengi
client.reg_5_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(a): Lungisa uVavanyo lweNgozi yokuSisiseko (BRA) oluchonga iingozi zeprojekthi.
client.reg_5_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(b): Nikezela ngeNkcazelo yeMpilo noKhuseleko echaza iimfuno ezithile zeprojekthi.
client.reg_5_1_l: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(l): Yamkela iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko seKontraka ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.

contractor.title: Izibophelelo zeKontraka
contractor.reg_7_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(a): Ngenisa iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwinkcazelo yomthengi.
contractor.reg_7_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina iFayile yeMpilo noKhuseleko kwisiza esinazo zonke iincwadi ezifunekayo.
contractor.reg_9: UMmiselo woKwakha 9: Qhuba uVavanyo lweNgozi kunye noVavanyo lweNgozi yokuChongwa kweHazard (HIRAs) ezithile kumsebenzi.

professional.title: Izibophelelo zeNgcali ye-H&S
professional.reg_5_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(5): AmaGosa (PrCHSA) alawula i-H&S egameni lomthengi, eqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa.
professional.reg_8_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) ancedisa abakontraka ekuphumezeni nasekuhlolisiseni iinkqubo ze-H&S.
professional.sacpcmp: Izikhokelo ze-SACPCMP: Kufuneka igcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD zesimo sobungcali.

step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwe-9: Ufuna ukwenza ntoni?
step_1.label: Khetha amaXwebhu oza kuwaQulunqa (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):

errors.document_types: Nceda khetha ubuncinane uxwebhu olunye oluza kuqulunqwa.

step_9.title: Inyathelo 9 kwe-9: Phonononga kwaye Yongeza kwiNgobo
step_9.description: Phonononga ukhetho lwakho kwaye uqhubeke nentlawulo.

errors.cart_empty: Nceda yongeza ubuncinane uxwebhu olunye kwingobo.

cart.title: Ingobo Yakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo yesiKhunjulwa se-Invoice: (Isebenza iintsuku ezisi-7. Bhalisa ukuze igcinwe ngokungapheliyo!)

resources.title: Qhagamshelana neeNgcali ze-H&S eziVunyiweyo
resources.description: Ufuna uncedo lwengcali? Nxibelelana neengcali ezivunyiweyo ngeemfuno zeprojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, Ummeli we-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: PR12345 - Qhagamshelana: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Igosa le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: CHSO67890 - Qhagamshelana: john.smith@example.com
resources.emily_brown: Emily Brown, Ummeli we-OHS - Qhagamshelana: emily.brown@example.com

chatbot.response: Ndilapha ukunceda! Ngeengcebiso ze-OHS ezenzelwe wena, nceda qhagamshelana nengcali.
chatbot.unavailable: I-Chatbot ayifumaneki. Nceda zama kwakhona kamva.
chatbot.error_generic: Oops, into ayihambanga kakuhle. Nceda zama kwakhona!
chatbot.no_match: Uxolo, andifumananga mfanekiso ochanekileyo. Zama ukuphinda ubhale!
chatbot.escalate: Andiqinisekanga ukuba ndingakunceda ngaloo nto. Ungathanda ukuqhagamshelana neqela lethu lenkxaso?

responses.hs_spec: INkcazelo yeMpilo noKhuseleko ichaza iimfuno ze-OHS zomthengi kwiprojekthi yokwakha, ngokweMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(b). Ibandakanya iinkcukacha zeprojekthi, iingozi, kunye nezibophelelo zokuthotyelwa.
responses.hs_plan: ISicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko silungiswa yikontraka ukulungisa iNkcazelo ye-H&S yomthengi, sichaza amanyathelo okhuseleko kunye neenkqubo, njengoko kufunwa nguMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(a).
responses.risk_assessment: UVavanyo lweNgozi luchonga iingozi kwaye luvavanya iingozi zemisebenzi yeprojekthi, eyimfuneko phantsi koMmiselo woKwakha 9.
responses.sacpcmp: I-SACPCMP (iBhunga laseMzantsi Afrika loLawulo lweProjekthi noKwakha) livumela iingcali ezifana nee-CHSOs nee-PrCHSAs ukuqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa kwe-OHS.
responses.coida: I-COIDA (uMthetho woXolelo lweZenzakalo zoMsebenzi kunye neZifo) ufuna ukuba abaqeshi babhalise ukuxolelwa kwezifo nezenzakalo zokusebenza.

construction.title: UKhuseleko lweMpilo yokuKwakha
construction.description: Qinisekisa ukuthotyelwa kwemimiselo yokhuseleko lwezempilo yokwakha usebenzisa izixhobo ze-OHS zeNcedo lweKhuseleko. Izixhobo zethu zikunceda ulawule iingozi, uthobele iimfuno zomthetho, kwaye ukhusele abasebenzi kwisiza, usebenzisa iindlela ezingcono ezichazwe kwi-'Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans.'

legal_appointments.title: Ukuqeshwa koMthetho
legal_appointments.description: Lawula ukuqeshwa komthetho wokhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini njengoko kufunwa yimimiselo ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika. Sebenzisa i-organogram ukunika iindima, ugcwalise iinkcukacha zomntu oqeshiweyo, kwaye uvelise uxwebhu olubanzi ngeeleta zokuqeshwa, iirekhodi zoqeqesho, nokunye.

legislation.title: Umthetho
legislation.description: Fikelela kwithala leencwadi elibanzi lemimiselo ye-OHS, imigangatho, kunye nohlaziyo. Velisa iirejista zomthetho ze-OHS, khangela imithetho ethile, kwaye uphonononge ubudlelwane phakathi kwemimiselo. Iinguqulelo ezilula ziyafumaneka ukuze uthenge ukwenza imibhalo yomthetho entsonkothileyo ifikeleleke ngakumbi.

step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwe-4: Phonononga kwaye Uvelise
step_4.description: Phonononga izinto ozingenisileyo kwaye uvelise i-RMP yakho. Ungayongeza umthetho ongezelelweyo ukuba uyafuneka.

cart.title: Hlawula
cart.description: I-RMP yakho ivelisiwe! Sebenzisa ikhowudi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukukhuphela simahla (abasebenzisi bokuqala abali-100).

services.title: Iinkonzo zeNcedo lweKhuseleko
services.description: Fumanisa uluhlu lweenkonzo zokhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini ezilungiselelwe ukuxhasa iindawo zokusebenza, izikolo, iicawe, kunye namacandelo angacwangciswanga kulo lonke elaseMzantsi Afrika. Ukusuka ekubonisana ukuya kuqeqesho, iNcedo lweKhuseleko inikezela ngezisombululo ezilungiselelweyo ukuqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa nokhuseleko.

consulting.title: Ukubonisana kwe-OHS
consulting.description: Fumana iingcebiso zengcali malunga nokuthotyelwa kwe-OHS, ulawulo lwengozi, kunye nokuqeshwa komthetho kwiingcali zethu ezivunyiweyo. Sisebenze nemibutho efana ne-Anglo Platinum, i-ABSA, kunye ne-Metrorail ukuhambisa izisombululo ezilungiselelweyo.

training.title: Iinkqubo zoQeqesho
training.description: Fikelela kwiinkqubo zoqeqesho ezibanzi zazo zonke iindustries, kubandakanya ukwakha, imveliso, kunye nemfundo. Khetha uqeqesho lokuqala, iikhosi ezithile zedima, kunye nokunye, konke kuhambelana nemimiselo ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika.

audits.title: Ukuhlolwa & Ukuhlolisiswa
audits.description: Qinisekisa ukuba indawo yakho yokusebenza ifikelela kwimigangatho ye-OHS ngeenkonzo zethu zokuhlola nokuhlolisiswa. Izixhobo zethu zikunceda uqhube ukuhlolwa okucokisekileyo, uvelise iingxelo, kwaye uphumeze amanyathelo okulungisa.

risk_management.title: Izicwangciso zoLawulo lweNgozi
risk_management.description: Velisa izicwangciso zolawulo lwengozi ezilungiselelweyo (RMPs) ezibandakanya umthetho waseMzantsi Afrika, imithetho kamasipala, kunye nemigangatho yamazwe ngamazwe efana ne-ISO 45001, eqinisekisa ukuba ishishini lakho lilungiselelwe nayiphi na ingozi.

support.title: Inkxaso & Izixhobo zoLuntu
support.description: Joyina uluntu lwethu ukuze uxele iziganeko, ufikelele kuluhlu lokutshekisha lokhuseleko lweevenkile ze-spaza, izikolo, kunye neethaveni, kwaye uxhume nezinye iingcali ze-OHS ukuze ufumane inkxaso kunye nentsebenziswano.

training.title: Uqeqesho oluBanzi lweNdawo yoMsebenzi
training.description: Phonononga iinkqubo zethu zoqeqesho ezibanzi zendawo yomsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa kwemimiselo ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika kunye nokukhuthaza indawo yokusebenza ekhuselekileyo. Khetha uqeqesho olusebenzayo, uqeqesho lweqela, okanye sebenzisa iwizadi yethu ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ezilungiselelweyo ngokusekelwe kwishishini lakho, abaphulaphuli ojolise kubo, kunye nendawo.

wizard.start: Nceda khetha ukhetho ukuqala inkqubo yengcebiso yoqeqesho.

step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwe-5: Khetha Abaphulaphuli Bakho abaJolise kubo

errors.target_audience: Nceda khetha ubuncinane abaphulaphuli abajolise kubo abanye.

step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwe-5: Phonononga uQeqesho oluCetyiswayo
step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kwizinto ozingenisileyo, nazi iinkqubo zoqeqesho ezicetyiswayo. Khetha ezo ufuna ukuzongeza kwingobo yakho.

errors.selected_training: Nceda khetha ubuncinane inkqubo yoqeqesho enye.

errors.emergency_line: Nceda ngenisa inombolo yoqhagamshelwano lwengxamiseko esebenzayo (umz., +27123456789).

checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso seNcedo lweKhuseleko: Izixhobo zoqeqesho ezinikezelweyo zezolwazi kuphela kwaye aziboneleli ngeengcebiso zobungcali. Ngeezisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelweyo, qhagamshelana neNcedo lweKhuseleko ku support@safetyhelp.co.za okanye tyelela Iphepha loQhagamshelwano.
checkout.success: Intlawulo iphumelele! Izixhobo zakho zoqeqesho zivelisiwe. Khuphela ii-PDF zakho ngezantsi. Ngoqeqesho lwe-intanethi, iikhowudi zokufikelela zithunyelwe nge-imeyile kuwe.

providers.title: Abanikezeli boQeqesho abaVunyiweyo
providers.description: Ufuna uqeqesho lobuqu? Qhagamshelana nabanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo ngeemfuno zakho.
providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - i-SETA eVunyiweyo - Igxile kuNcedo lokuQala, ukuCima uMlilo - Qhagamshelana: info@abctraining.co.za
providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - eBhalisiwe kwi-SACPCMP - Igxile kuKhuseleko lokuKwakha - Qhagamshelana: training@safeskills.co.za
providers.provider_3: uQeqesho lweNcedo lweKhuseleko - uQeqesho lwe-OHS oluBanzi - Qhagamshelana: support@safetyhelp.co.za

purchase.title: Thenga iManuwali yoQeqesho eLungisekayo
purchase.description: Fumana imanuwali yoqeqesho ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, kubandakanya iimfuno zomthetho, umxholo othile wenkampani ngokusekelwe kwiprofayile yakho yengozi, kunye neekowuti ezivela kubanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo.

risk_profile.title: Chaza iProfayile yeNgozi yeManuwali yakho yoQeqesho

facts.legal_fact_step_1: Inyaniso yoMthetho: iCandelo 8 loMthetho we-OHS lifuna ukuba abaqeshi banikeze uqeqesho olulungiselelwe iingozi ezithile zendawo yomsebenzi.
facts.fun_fact_step_2: Inyaniso eMnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba uqeqesho oluqhelekileyo lunokunciphisa iziganeko zendawo yomsebenzi ukuya kuthi ga kwi-30%?
facts.legal_fact_step_3: Inyaniso yoMthetho: Oomasipala bendawo banokuba nemimiselo ye-OHS eyahlukileyo echaphazela iimfuno zoqeqesho.
facts.fun_fact_step_4: Inyaniso eMnandi: Iindawo zokusebenza ezinobungozi obuphezulu njengeziza zokwakha zifuna uqeqesho oluqhelekileyo ukuze kugcinwe imigangatho yokhuseleko.
facts.legal_fact_step_5: Inyaniso yoMthetho: UMthetho we-OHS unyanzelisa uqeqesho oluthile lweendima ezifana nabameli be-SHE ukuqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa.

suppliers.title: Uluhlu lwaBanikezeli be-OHS
suppliers.description: Fumana kwaye ubeke kwisikhundla abanikezeli be-OHS eMzantsi Afrika. Khetha ngokwendawo, iinkonzo, kunye nezivunyiweyo. Ngenisa iziphononongo ukuze uncede abanye benze izigqibo ezinolwazi.

errors.rating: Nceda khetha ukumiselwa phakathi kwe-1 kunye ne-5.

community_tools.title: Izixhobo zoKhuseleko loLuntu
community_tools.description: Xela nasiphi isiganeko sokhuseleko okanye ingozi kuluntu lwakho okanye kwindawo yakho yokusebenza, ukusuka kwimingxuma ukuya kwizixhobo ezonakeleyo. Sebenzisa izixhobo zethu ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko kwiisetingi ezifana neevenkile ze-spaza, izikolo, izibhedlele, kunye neethaveni.

fields.description_placeholder: Chaza isiganeko okanye ingozi (umz., umngxuma kwiSitalato esiKhulu, isitulo esaphukileyo kwiziko loluntu)...
fields.user_social: Isibambo sakho seMidiya yoLuntu (Ukuzikhethela, umz., @username kwi-X):
fields.provider_contact_placeholder: Ngenisa umnxeba okanye i-imeyile (igcwaliso ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umnikezeli ukhethiwe)...
fields.provider_social: Isibambo seMidiya yoLuntu soMnikezeli weNkonzo (Ukuzikhethela, umz., @CityofJoburgZA kwi-X):
fields.provider_social_placeholder: Ngenisa isibambo se-X (igcwaliso ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umnikezeli ukhethiwe)...

spaza_shop.title: Uluhlu lokuTshekisha lwe-OHS lweSpaza Shop
spaza_shop.description: Qinisekisa ukuba ivenkile yakho ye-spaza ifikelela kwiimfuno zokhuseleko lomlilo, zombane, kunye nesakhiwo ngokwemimiselo kamasipala kunye noMthetho we-OHS.

school.title: Isikhokelo soKhuseleko loMlilo seSikolo
school.description: Funda iimfuno zomthetho zokhuseleko lomlilo ezikolweni, kubandakanya izicwangciso zokuphuma kunye nezixhobo.

hospital.title: Isikhokelo sokuLungiselela iNgxamiseko seSibhedlele
hospital.description: Qinisekisa ukuba izibhedlele zilungiselele iingxaki ngokuba nezicwangciso zokuphuma ezifanelekileyo kunye nezixhobo zokhuseleko.

tavern.title: Uluhlu lokuTshekisha loKhuseleko lweTavern
tavern.description: Tshekisha ukuba iithaveni zithobela imimiselo yokhuseleko lomlilo kunye nolawulo lwesihlwele ukuthintela iziganeko.

dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi yeLungu
dashboard.welcome: Wamkelekile, {user_name}! Lawula ukuthotyelwa kwakho kwe-OHS, ii-RMPs, iziphononongo zabanikezeli, kunye neengxelo zoluntu apha.

document_categories.title: Qulunqa amaXwebhu akho eNkqubo yoLawulo lwe-OHS
document_categories.description: Khetha kwaye uqulunqe amaxwebhu owayifunayo kwinkqubo yakho yolawulo lwe-OHS. Khetha kwimigaqo-nkqubo, iinkqubo, imigangatho, kunye nokunye, okulungiselelwe iimfuno zombutho wakho.

policies.title: Imigaqo-nkqubo
policies.description: Iingxelo zenqanaba eliphezulu zokuzimisela kunye nokuzibophelela, ezivunyiweyo ngabaphathi abaphezulu.
policies.infectious_disease_policy: uMgaqo-nkqubo wokuSabela kwisifo esiSulelayo okanye i-COVID-19
policies.ohs_performance_review_objectives_policy: uMgaqo-nkqubo wokuSebenza, uPhononongo, kunye neeNjongo ze-OHS
policies.ohs_communication_participation_consulta: uMgaqo-nkqubo woNxibelelwano, ukuThatha iNxaxheba, kunye nokuBonisana kwe-OHS
policies.ohs_workplace_health_wellness_policy: uMgaqo-nkqubo weMpilo kunye nokuPhilisa eMsebenzini we-OHS
policies.ohs_documentation_records_control_policy: uMgaqo-nkqubo woLawulo lweeRekhodi kunye namaXwebhu e-OHS

procedures.title: Iinkqubo
procedures.description: Izikhokelo zenyathelo ngenyathelo zokwenza imisebenzi ngokukhuselekileyo nangokungaguqukiyo.
procedures.hira_procedure: Inkqubo yokuChongwa kweeNgozi kunye noVavanyo lweNgozi (HIRA)
procedures.first_aid_procedure: Inkqubo yoNcedo lokuQala kunye neNgxamiseko yoNyango

standards.title: Imigangatho/Izikhokelo
standards.description: Imigangatho yangaphakathi ehambelana nomthetho okanye imigangatho yeshishini, echaza iimeko okanye ukuziphatha okulindelweyo.
standards.hygiene_facility_standard: uMgangatho weZiko leZococeko (izindlu zangasese, amanzi, iindawo zokuphumla)
standards.ohs_performance_review_objectives_standa: uMgangatho wokuSebenza, uPhononongo, kunye neeNjongo ze-OHS
standards.ohs_communication_participation_consulta: uMgangatho woNxibelelwano, ukuThatha iNxaxheba, kunye nokuBonisana kwe-OHS
standards.ohs_workplace_health_wellness_standard: uMgangatho weMpilo kunye nokuPhilisa eMsebenzini we-OHS
standards.ohs_documentation_records_control_standa: uMgangatho woLawulo lweeRekhodi kunye namaXwebhu e-OHS

registers_logs.title: Iirejista kunye neeLogi
registers_logs.description: Iirekhodi ezihlaziywa ngokuqhubekayo zokulandelela kunye nokulandelelwa.

templates_forms.title: Iitemplate/Iifomu
templates_forms.description: Amaxwebhu alungiselelwe kwangaphambili ukudibanisa kunye nokwenza umgangatho wenkcukacha.
templates_forms.fit_for_duty_form: iFomu yokuLungela uMsebenzi / uVavanyo lokuBuyela eMsebenzini
templates_forms.emergency_management_forms_checklists: Iifomu kunye noLuhlu lokuTshekisha loLawulo lweNgxamiseko
templates_forms.risk_management_forms_checklists: Iifomu kunye noLuhlu lokuTshekisha loLawulo lweNgozi
templates_forms.construction_ohs_forms_checklists: Iifomu kunye noLuhlu lokuTshekisha lwe-OHS yokuKwakha
templates_forms.ohs_audit_inspection_forms_checklists: Iifomu kunye noLuhlu lokuTshekisha lokuHlolwa kunye nokuHlolisiswa kwe-OHS
templates_forms.ohs_legal_compliance_evaluation_checklis: uLuhlu lokuTshekisha loVavanyo lokuThotyelwa koMthetho we-OHS
templates_forms.ohs_incident_report_investigation: Iifomu zokuXela kunye nokuPhanda ngeZiganeko ze-OHS
templates_forms.ohs_contractor_management_forms_template: Iifomu kunye neeTemplate zoLawulo lweeKontraka ze-OHS
templates_forms.ohs_performance_review_objectives_forms_: Iifomu kunye neeTemplate zokuSebenza, uPhononongo, kunye neeNjongo ze-OHS
templates_forms.ohs_control_measures_forms_templates: Iifomu kunye neeTemplate zeeNyathelo zoLawulo lwe-OHS
templates_forms.ohs_communication_participation_consulta: Iifomu kunye neeTemplate zoNxibelelwano, ukuThatha iNxaxheba, kunye nokuBonisana kwe-OHS
